Method Detail

handleException

protected boolean handleException(java.rmi.RemoteException e,
                                  int numberOfTries,
                                  ConnectionManager<Connection> connectionManager)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method determines whether the exception is timeout related and will be handled in this method or whether it should be handled by another layer

Parameters:
e - exception that was intercepted
numberOfTries - number this method was already called for the same method call, this will help to determine the timeout
connectionManager - this object is used to retrieve timeout related configuration parameters
Returns:
true if exception was handled here and method call should be retried, false if exception should be passed to next layer
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

retryLogin

protected java.lang.String retryLogin(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                      com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.fault.InvalidSessionFault e,
                                      int numberOfTries,
                                      ConnectionManager<Connection> connectionManager)
                               throws com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.fault.InvalidSessionFault
This method tries to retrieve the timed out connection and logs in again

Parameters:
sessionId - invalid session id
e - detailed error message of time out login
numberOfTries - number of times this method or another exception handling method has been called
connectionManager - object to retrieve connection object from
Returns:
new session id
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
com.vasoftware.sf.soap44.fault.InvalidSessionFault
